channel.title: Forum animations are messed up for me
channel.description:
Ok, at first when this happened I was just like whatever, just a small problem, who cares? But now, it is really starting to get on my nerves, and the problem is getting worse.
All the animations are messed up for me. When I go to post, it shows a blank space where you click to add a 'Tounge' smiley face, where the 'Insert Table Row' is, it shows the 'angry' smiley.
This has been going on for a while, but today when I signed in I got this instead of the NewTopic picture: http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/5088/annoying1wt.png
I couldn't even find the IMG tag, so I just posted the link.
Instead of a 'New' symbol, it says its 'locked.'
By the way, I am using the latest version of FireFox.
Also, even the 'Online/Offline' Symbols are changed to smily faces.
Could this be fixed please?
Thanks, Cheesehunk. [br][size=1]Posted at: June 17, 2006, 03:05:34 am[/size][hr]Now it shows all stickies as locked.
and the RollsEyes Emotion as the modify button..
Theres some others, to lazy to explain.

Ok, at first when this happened I was just like whatever, just a small problem, who cares?
But now, it is really starting to get on my nerves, and the problem is getting worse.
